CustomField.formula: IF( X1st_Meeting_Happened__c = True && X2nd_Meeting_Happened__c = True, "1st & 2nd Meetings", IF( X1st_Meeting_Happened__c = True && X2nd_Meeting_Happened__c = False, "1st Meeting Only", IF (X1st_Meeting_Happened__c = False && X2nd_Meeting_Happened__c = True, "2nd Meeting Only", "No Meetings")))
CustomField.label: Meetings Held
